extension.name: NZBDonkey
extension.description: The ultimate NZB file download tool!

catchLinks.title: NZBLNK links
catchLinks.description: Catch left mouse clicks on NZBLNK links and process the NZBLNK link

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Choose the level of notifications to be shown
notifications.showSuccess: only show success and error notifications

showNzbDialog.description: Show the settings dialog to set the title, password, target and other options for each NZB file.
showNzbDialog.title: NZB file settings dialog

selectText.searchKeyTitle: Custom search terms for text selection

allowMultipleTargets.title: Multiple targets
allowMultipleTargets.enabled: The NZB file is sent to all active targets
allowMultipleTargets.disabled: The NZB file is sent to the selected target

defaultTarget.title: Default target
defaultTarget.description: Choose the standard target to use

showTargetsInContextMenu.title: Show targets in context menu
showTargetsInContextMenu.description: show the targets in the context menu to choose which target to use

confirmDelete.message: Do you really want to delete the NZB file target $1?

useCategories.title: Use categories
useCategories.description: use categories for this NZB file target

categories.pleaseDefineCategoriesInTarget: you need to define the categories in $1 before you can use this feature

confirmDelete.message: Do you really want to delete category $1?

categories.reorder: The order in which the categories are tested can be modified using drag & drop
categories.loadingError: error while loading the categories from $1

asQueued.description: add the NZB file to the queue instead of starting the download immediately
asQueued.name: Add to the queue

processing.addPasswordToFilename: add the password to the filename in curly brackets
processing.addTitle: add the title to the NZB file meta data
processing.addPassword: add the password to the NZB file meta data
processing.addCategory: add the category to the NZB file meta data

completeness.title: NZB file completeness settings
completeness.fileCheck: check NZB file for file completeness
completeness.segmentCheck: check NZB file for segment completeness
completeness.fileCheckThreshold: maximum amount of allowed missing files
completeness.segmentCheckThreshold: maximum amount of allowed missing segment (in percent)

filesToBeRemoved.description: Files containing the above search terms in the file name are removed from the NZB file.
filesToBeRemoved.title: File filtering

searchOrder.title: Search order
searchOrder.parallel: search in all active search engines in parallel
searchOrder.sequential: search the active search engines in sequential order

engine.title: Name

searchPattern.json: JSON object path for the NZB id
searchPattern.html: Regexp search pattern for the NZB id

groupByPoster.title: Merge NZB files
groupByPoster.description: Merge NZB files from same poster

posterPattern.html: Regexp search pattern for the poster
posterPattern.json: JSON object path for the poster

engine.resultSelector: CSS selector for the result container

searchEngines.reorder: Reorder the search engines with drag & drop

confirmDelete.message: Do you really want to delete $1?
Do you really want to delete the domain $1?

enabled.title: Download interception
enabled.description: enable the NZB file download interception

interceptArchiveFiles.title: Include archive files
interceptArchiveFiles.description: also intercept the download of archive files

showNzbDialog.title: NZB settings dialog
showNzbDialog.description: show a dialog to set title, password, and other options

confirmAdvancedSettings.message: The advanced settings are only required under special circumstances, e.g. if your NZB file target is behind a reverse proxy.

targets.noTargetsDefined: No NZB file targets defined yet!

addAsPaused.title: Add as paused
addAsPaused.description: add the NZB file to the queue as paused

settings.deviceDescription: Can only be selected after the connection test.
settings.deviceError: There are no target devices available!

common.title: Title
common.creditsDisclaimer: NZBDonkey makes use of the following packages under their corresponding license
common.extensionMustBeConfiguredFirst: The extension must first be configured for use.

validation.atLeastOneOptionRequired: At least one option is required
validation.noBaseDomain: Please only enter a base domain name, no subdomain, and without http(s)
validation.noReplacementString: The URL must contain the string %s as placeholder
validation.noValidRegexp: Please provide a valid regular expression
validation.noValidJSONPath: Please provide a valid JSON path
validation.noValidHostOrIp: please provide a valid host name or IP address
validation.noValidPort: please provide a valid port number
validation.noSegments: the nzb file has no segments
validation.noFiles: the nzb file has no files
validation.regexpNotSupported: This regexp is too complex and cannot be used

interception.fetchResponseProcessingError: error while processing file "$1" intercepted on $2: $3
interception.requestBlocked: The Request for $1 has been intercepted and is being processed.
interception.fetchResponseArchiveProcessingSuccess: The interception of archive $1 was successful.
interception.fetchResponseArchiveProcessingPartialSuc: The interception of archive $1 partially failed with $2 errors.

download.description: save in the browser's download folder

contextMenu.sendToProcessing: Processing the context menu click on $1

confirmDeleteDebuglog.message: Do you really want to delete the debug log?

confirmDeleteNzblog.message: Do you really want to delete the NZB file log?

errors.noSearchResults: no search engine returned a search results
errors.errorWhilePushingToTarget: error while pushing the nzb file to an nzb file target
errors.pushingToAllTargetsFailed: pushing the nzb file failed for all nzb file targets
errors.errorWhileProcessingContextMenuClick: Error while processing context menu click: $1
errors.settingsWereNotPreserved: Not all settings from the previous version could be migrated and there are new options.
errors.hostPermissionsRequired: NZBDonkey requires permission to access all websites in order to function properly
errors.settingsMigrationError: the migration of the settings has failed
